title: Stage S10
description: Level 1 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
learning_points: Level 1 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: It is a red apple.
I have a small car.
The big house is beautiful.
She is very happy today.
This is an expensive watch.
The old man is kind.
I want a hot coffee.
The young girl is smart.
It's a long story.
The white cat is sleeping.
It is a red apple.
I have a small car.
The big house is beautiful.
She is very happy today.
This is an expensive watch.
The old man is kind.
I want a hot coffee.
The young girl is smart.
It's a long story.
The white cat is sleeping.

sentences.kr: 더 일찍 알았다면 도와드렸을 텐데요. (과거 후회)
sentences.en: If I had known earlier, I would have helped.

sentences.kr: 더 열심히 공부했다면 시험에 합격했을 텐데요. (과거 결과)
sentences.en: If she had studied harder, she would have passed the exam.

sentences.kr: 더 일찍 출발했다면 기차를 놓치지 않았을 텐데요. (과거 실수)
sentences.en: If we had left earlier, we wouldn't have missed the train.

sentences.kr: 더 조심했다면 사고가 일어나지 않았을 텐데요. (사고 후회)
sentences.en: If I had been more careful, the accident wouldn't have happened.
If you had told me, I could have helped you.

sentences.kr: 비가 오지 않았다면 피크닉을 했을 텐데요. (날씨 아쉬움)
sentences.en: If it hadn't rained, we would have had a picnic.

sentences.kr: 돈을 모았다면 그 차를 살 수 있었는데요. (재정 후회)
sentences.en: If I had saved money, I could have bought that car.

sentences.kr: 제시간에 도착했다면 회의가 시작되었을 텐데요. (지각 결과)
sentences.en: If they had arrived on time, the meeting would have started.

sentences.kr: 영어를 더 일찍 배웠다면 더 좋은 직장을 얻었을 텐데요. (교육 후회)
sentences.en: If I had learned English earlier, I would have gotten a better job.

sentences.kr: 의사가 거기 있었다면 환자를 구할 수 있었을지도 모릅니다. (생명 가정)
sentences.en: If the doctor had been there, he might have saved the patient.

sentences.kr: 더 일찍 알았다면 도와드렸을 텐데요. (과거 후회)
sentences.en: If I had known earlier, I would have helped.

sentences.kr: 더 열심히 공부했다면 시험에 합격했을 텐데요. (과거 결과)
sentences.en: If she had studied harder, she would have passed the exam.

sentences.en: If we had left earlier, we wouldn't have missed the train.

sentences.kr: 더 조심했다면 사고가 일어나지 않았을 텐데요. (사고 후회)
sentences.en: If I had been more careful, the accident wouldn't have happened.
If you had told me, I could have helped you.

sentences.kr: 비가 오지 않았다면 피크닉을 했을 텐데요. (날씨 아쉬움)
sentences.en: If it hadn't rained, we would have had a picnic.

sentences.en: If I had saved money, I could have bought that car.

sentences.kr: 제시간에 도착했다면 회의가 시작되었을 텐데요. (지각 결과)
sentences.en: If they had arrived on time, the meeting would have started.

sentences.kr: 영어를 더 일찍 배웠다면 더 좋은 직장을 얻었을 텐데요. (교육 후회)
sentences.en: If I had learned English earlier, I would have gotten a better job.

sentences.kr: 의사가 거기 있었다면 환자를 구할 수 있었을지도 모릅니다. (생명 가정)
sentences.en: If the doctor had been there, he might have saved the patient.
